answerText: Dracula[10] Dracula was written by this author, a longtime manager of the Lyceum Theater.
heading: Michigan Fall Tournament |2013 | Editors Round 7 | 7 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One character in this novel develops a scheme to feed animals to progressively larger animals with the end goal of absorbing all of their powers. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Lucy Westenra accepts a proposal from Arthur Holmwood but dies shortly thereafter. Its title character is followed by Jonathan Harker after threatening Harker's wife Mina.
